input.sentences: my boss is telling the audience members to start the dinner .
my boss is getting ready to give his speech on fundraising .
my boss and the head chef are trying to make sure the tables and chairs are set properly .
most of my co-workers and colleagues attend the meeting .
after the speech is over my boss is getting ready to leave .
output.sentences: I was late to the gig but arrived just in time to hear Bill's big pitch!
I can tell he is nervous by the way he toys with that tie.
That pillar is not a bible Bill, please don't say I promise again.
With his grandson beside him, I hope he realizes that he is setting examples good or bad.
One hand extended while the other's in his pocket, Bill sure talks a lot of financial bull. My head feels like it has been charged by one!
